title: How to Help a Friend Who is Thinking About Suicide
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Gregory Jantz
itunes:summary:
According to Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) data, suicide is the second leading cause of death among people ages 10-34. And even though suicide is pervasive, the stigma around depression causes many to suffer silently. Tune in to learn key warning signs and find out how you can offer hope to loved ones battling despair. 


Receive the book "So Much to Live for" and the audio download of the broadcast "How to Help a Friend Who is Thinking About Suicide" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-09-15?refcd=1467704


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/how-to-help-a-friend-who-is-thinking-about-suicide/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
